001package com.technototes.library.command;
002
003/** Command group to run commands in sequence
004 * @author Alex Stedman
005 */
006public class SequentialCommandGroup extends CommandGroup {
007    protected Command lastCommand;
008
009    /** Make sequential command group
010     *
011     * @param commands The commands to run
012     */
013    public SequentialCommandGroup(Command... commands) {
014        super(true, commands);
015    }
016
017    @Override
018    public void schedule(Command c) {
019        if (lastCommand == null) {
020            CommandScheduler.getInstance().scheduleWithOther(this, c);
021        } else {
022            CommandScheduler.getInstance().scheduleAfterOther(lastCommand, c);
023        }
024        lastCommand = c;
025    }
026
027    /** Returns if all the commands are finished
028     *
029     * @return Is the command group finished
030     */
031    @Override
032    public boolean isFinished() {
033        return lastCommand.justFinished() || (anyCancelled && !countCancel);
034    }
035}
